title: (x) Bright Minds - Footlight (slanted) {Yves}
content:
Hi to all,   
   
Could you please identify this font?

author: misalion

comments.content:
Yves,   
   
Maybe I should start posting after midnight my time (I guess daytime your time) for you, so you can have shorter leadtime...? Just kidding!   
   
Thank you for posting even though this is a suicidal attempt.
Ozzy Osbourne would surely agree with you, Yves.
